poem:
"The Fragile Doctrine of Monoliths"

In the early morn,
the Lehman truth unfolds,
an untamed tale in ink,
shown not too big to fall.

A trilogy of secrets
now bared in southern light,
tempered by a craftsman's touch,
a flawed project in sight.

Global tremors from a fall,
Power moulds into a play,
Stark in the Australian day-
Ever heard it all? Not quite.
